en-US.summary: A sample skill that demonstrates the use of a Spokestack TTS voice in place of Alexa's and a loving tribute to Stuart Smalley.
examplePhrases: Alexa tell Custom T.T.S. to say something
Alexa tell Custom T.T.S. to motivate me
en-US.name: Stuart Smallish
en-US.description: A sample skill that demonstrates the use of a Spokestack TTS voice in place of Alexa's and a loving tribute to Stuart Smalley.
